entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 7:04 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
